Like any other shooter?

topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556f160363687209139e1f00#post_556f160363687209139e1f00
Kind of weird if you use Gyro controls.
topics.author: 505696b47f123b37e800effa

topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556f160363687209139e1f00#post_556f160363687209139e1f00
The gyro controls do take some getting used to but I recommend you keep them on. They improve your reaction time so much.

"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556f183963687209a81c1d00#post_556f183963687209a81c1d00
